statements: SELECT * FROM image_recognition WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM image_recognition WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT image_url, product_name, product_description FROM image_recognition WHERE product_name = 'Shirt' AND product_category = 'Clothing';
SELECT * FROM image_recognition ORDER BY product_name ASC, product_category DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_images FROM image_recognition;
SELECT * FROM image_recognition WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM image_recognition WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT image_url FROM image_recognition WHERE product_name LIKE '%phone%' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM image_recognition WHERE product_category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, product_name, product_category, product_description FROM image_recognition WHERE product_category = 'Home Decor' AND product_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_id = '60b92850-afc3-4f40-956c-c3c2541a3b30';
SELECT image_name FROM images WHERE image_name LIKE '%nature%';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE product_image_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products JOIN images ON products.product_image_id = images.image_id;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_name = 'example_image';
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM images ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%product%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, image_name FROM products JOIN images ON products.product_image_id = images.image_id;
SELECT DISTINCT image_name FROM images;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, image_url FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT description, product_name FROM products WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM images JOIN products ON images.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT tag_name, image_url FROM image_tags JOIN images ON image_tags.image_id = images.image_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT products.product_name, images.image_url FROM products JOIN images ON products.product_id = images.product_id;
SELECT product_name, tag_name FROM products JOIN images ON products.product_id = images.product_id JOIN image_tags ON images.image_id = image_tags.image_id;

SELECT products.product_id, products.product_name, images.image_url, image_tags.tag_name FROM products LEFT JOIN images ON products.product_id = images.product_id LEFT JOIN image_tags ON images.image_id = image_tags.image_id;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT id, image_data FROM images ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM product_images INNER JOIN products ON product_images.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT image_id, annotation FROM image_annotations WHERE annotation ILIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT id, image_data FROM images WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.name, i.image_data FROM products p JOIN product_images pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id JOIN images i ON pi.image_id = i.id;
SELECT annotation_id, annotation FROM image_annotations WHERE image_id IN (SELECT id FROM images WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT * FROM Images;
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM Images WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM Products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(image_id) AS image_count FROM ProductImages GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT image_id, product_id, score FROM ImageMatches WHERE score > 0.8 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM Images;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM Products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT feature_vector FROM ImageFeatures WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_id, image_id FROM ProductImages WHERE product_id = 'c7f6d1ac-4486-4d46-a2b0-921dc9629fb0' AND image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM ImageMatches WHERE score > 0.75 ORDER BY score DESC;
